toys.name: nanoblok - Pikachu [Pokémon], Pokémon Series Building Kit
toys.desc: Pikachu From Nanoblock'S Pokemon Collection Series Stands Approximately 4,5 cm Tall And Has 120 Pieces. Difficulty: Based On A Scale From 1 To 5. 1 Being The Easiest And 5 Being Most Advanced. This Model Is Based At A Level 2, For Ages 8+

toys.name: nanoblock - Bulbasaur [Pokémon], Pokémon Series Building Kit (NBPM_003)
toys.desc: Nanoblocks are a superior building experience with greater challenge, sophistication and detail than any other construction set. The Smaller the Brick the Better the Build; Bulbasaur sets come with detailed step by step instructions, for ages 8+

toys.name: nanoblock Pokemon Squirtle Building Kit (NBPM_004)
toys.desc: Pokemon appeared to nano block and Squirtle came over 120 pieces!. Pokemon Character Zenigame.

toys.name: nanoblock - Eevee [Pokémon], Pokémon Series Building Kit (NBPM_005)
